thread.title: Officials of Saudi side Al-Wahda travel to Tarkwa today to finalize partnership agreement with Ghana's Medeama
thread.title_full: Officials of Saudi side Al-Wahda travel to Tarkwa today to finalize partnership agreement with Ghana's Medeama

title: Officials of Saudi side Al-Wahda travel to Tarkwa today to finalize partnership agreement with Ghana's Medeama
text:
Sports News | 7 October 2015 21:55 CET Officials of Saudi side Al-Wahda travel to Tarkwa today to finalize partnership agreement with Ghana's Medeama - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Officials of the gulf region arrived in Ghana on Tuesday to firm up plans to sign a mega partnership deal with the ambitious local side. 
They held series of meetings with Medeama president Moses Armah in Accra and will unveil their plans to the media when they touch base in Tarkwa-home of the Ghanaian side on Wednesday. 
Morsi Hisham Fouad is leading a delegation from the Saudi Arabia to seal a partnership agreement with the Ghana Premier League club for the exchange of coaching and business expertise. 
The agreement which was brokered by Step by Step Football Management will see Al-Wahda offer financial support to Medeama for the campaign in next season's CAF Champions League. 
Medeama will be representing Ghana in next season's CAF Confederations Cup following their second success in the FA Cup after beating Asante Kotoko in the finals played last month. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
